Description: EVH WolfgangMystic Blue MetallicExcellent Condition!Barely Used!No fret wear! I'll throw in some D-Tuna parts that I once had installed on a different guitar. ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Tone and Playability as Legendary as Its NameThe EVH Wolfgang Standard was built to Eddie Van Halen's exacting standards, resulting in a highly playable solidbody electric guitar with ferocious crunch. Dual EVH Wolfgang humbuckers are mounted directly to this guitar's body, yielding a distinctive woody character and ample sustain. The Wolfgang's one-piece bolt-on maple neck is reinforced with graphite rods, ensuring maximum stability and resistance to temperature and humidity. An EVH-branded Floyd Rose Special tremolo and locking nut maintain intonation - even after extreme dive-bombing. The EVH Wolfgang Standard solidbody electric guitar reflects a commitment to quality worthy of the extraordinary guitarist it's named after.EVH Wolfgang Standard Solidbody Electric Guitar at a Glance:A rock machine that's built for serious fretworkGraphite-reinforced neck for stability and playabilityFloyd Rose tremolo allows for twisting, bending, and huge dive-bombsA rock machine that's built for serious fretworkAt Sweetwater, we've been consistently impressed by EVH guitars, and the Wolfgang Standard is no exception. From its basswood body to its maple neck and fingerboard, this guitar just screams quality. This amazing guitar is made for serious playing, with a compound-radius fingerboard, an EVH Floyd Rose bridge and locking nut, and direct-mounted EVH humbuckers. You also get two domed black knobs for total control over your tone and volume and ultra-stable EVH tuners. All the components come together to make a high-performance electric guitar.Graphite-reinforced neck for stability and playabilityThe neck is one of the most important aspects of any instrument, which is why this EVH Wolfgang Standard's bolt-on neck is reinforced with graphite, offering amazing stability. You'll also love the playability and feel of the compound-radius fretboard on this Wolfgang Standard. The fretboard radius goes from 12" at the nut to a comfortable and flat 16" radius on the upper frets.Floyd Rose tremolo allows for twisting, bending, and huge dive-bombsFirst gaining popularity in the 1980s, the Floyd Rose tremolo's locking design keeps your guitar in tune - even if you like to perform extreme pitch pyrotechnics. You can force the whammy bar all the way down to the guitar's body for psychotic dive-bombing. No matter how hard you're shredding, you'll maintain your tuning stability, thanks to the Floyd Rose tremolo's locking design.EVH Wolfgang Standard Solidbody Electric Guitar Features:Solidbody electric guitar designed by rock legend Eddie Van HalenBasswood body and dual EVH pickups deliver resonant tone, sustain, and crunchCompound-radius allows for exceptional speed and comfortEVH-branded Floyd Rose tremolo allows for twisting, bending, and dive-bombingComfort cut forearm contour for maximum playing easeBelly cut allows the guitar to fit comfortably against your torsoThe EVH Wolfgang Standard solidbody electric guitar puts a legendary tonal tool in your hands!
Title: EVH Wolfgang Standard - Mystic Blue Metallic - Excellent! No Reserve!
ConditionDescription: Excellent cosmetic and excellent working condition!
